Serang Warga Saat Berwudhu, Buaya Mati Dihajar Massa
02 Nov 2019, 12:11 by Chaidir Anwar Tanjung
Pekanbaru - Hasnati (38) warga Desa Sungai Paya, Kecamatan Batang Tuaka, Kabupaten Indragiri Hilir (Inhil), Riau, diserang buaya saat berwudu. Buaya yang menyerang Hasnati akhirnya mati karena dipukuli warga.
"Korban hendak salat Isya dan lagi mengambil wudhu di aliran sungai Parit 5. Tiba-tiba buaya menyerangnya," kata Kapolres Inhil, Indra Lamhot Sihombing kepada wartawan, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Indra menjelaskan, peristiwa tersebut terjadi pada Jumat (1/11) sekitar pukul 19.30 WIB. Ketika diserang, Hasnati berteriak meminta pertolongan.
"Sembari berusaha melepaskan gigitan buaya, korban juga teriak meminta tolong warga sekitar," ujar Indra.
Warga pun langsung berdatangan ke lokasi. Warga kemudian memukuli buaya tersebut dengan kayu sehingga gigitannya ke Hasnati lepas.
"Warga ramai memukuli buaya dengan kayu, bambu hingga buaya tersebut akhirnya mati," kata Indra.

Attacking Residents When Ablution, Crocodile Dead Beaten By Mass
02 Nov 2019, 12:11 by Chaidir Anwar Tanjung
Pekanbaru - Hasnati (38) resident of Sungai Paya Village, Batang Tuaka Subdistrict, Indragiri Hilir (Inhil) Regency, Riau, was attacked by crocodiles while performing wudoo '. The crocodile who attacked Hasnati eventually died because of being beaten by residents.
"The victim was about to pray Isha and again took ablution in the river Trench 5. Suddenly the crocodile attacked him," Inhil Police Chief Indra Lamhot Sihombing told reporters on Saturday (2/11/2019).
Indra explained, the incident occurred on Friday (1/11) around 19.30 WIB. When attacked, Hasnati shouted for help.
"While trying to release a crocodile bite, the victim also shouted for help from local residents," Indra said.
Residents immediately came to the location. Residents then beat the crocodile with wood so that its bite off Hasnati fell off.
"Residents were busy beating crocodiles with wood, bamboo until the crocodile finally died," Indra said.
